  5. #include "port/port_posix.h"

  7. #include <cstdlib>
  8. #include <stdio.h>
  9. #include <string.h>
  10. #include "util/logging.h"

  12. namespace leveldb {
  13. namespace port {

  15. ‌static void PthreadCall(const char* label, int result) {
  16.   if (result != 0) {
  17.     fprintf(stderr, "pthread %s: %s\n", label, strerror(result));
  18.     abort();
  19.   }
  20. }

  22. ‌Mutex::Mutex() { PthreadCall("init mutex", pthread_mutex_init(&mu_, NULL)); }

  24. ‌Mutex::~Mutex() { PthreadCall("destroy mutex", pthread_mutex_destroy(&mu_)); }

  26. ‌void Mutex::Lock() { PthreadCall("lock", pthread_mutex_lock(&mu_)); }

  28. ‌void Mutex::Unlock() { PthreadCall("unlock", pthread_mutex_unlock(&mu_)); }

  30. ‌CondVar::CondVar(Mutex* mu)
  31.     : mu_(mu) {
  32.     PthreadCall("init cv", pthread_cond_init(&cv_, NULL));
  33. }

  35. ‌CondVar::~CondVar() { PthreadCall("destroy cv", pthread_cond_destroy(&cv_)); }

  37. ‌void CondVar::Wait() {
  38.   PthreadCall("wait", pthread_cond_wait(&cv_, &mu_->mu_));
  39. }

  41. ‌void CondVar::Signal() {
  42.   PthreadCall("signal", pthread_cond_signal(&cv_));
  43. }

  45. ‌void CondVar::SignalAll() {
  46.   PthreadCall("broadcast", pthread_cond_broadcast(&cv_));
  47. }

  49. ‌void InitOnce(OnceType* once, void (*initializer)()) {
  50.   PthreadCall("once", pthread_once(once, initializer));
  51. }

  53. }  // namespace port
  54. }  // namespace leveldb
